casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Joe Earl WILSON. No. 77P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. Joe Earl Wilson, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Defendant on the 3rd day of February 2005 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Lenoir County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of March 2005."
